attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: tax cyclists and introduce compulsory insurance groups . they pay nothing and break more laws on a bike ride than most motorists.they damage property and cause injury to pedestrians with the air of the untouchable .and woe betide anyone telling them that the footpath is not theirs to use.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
